name: Dispelling Critical

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Arcane Strike, base attack bonus +11, ability to cast dispel magic.

sections.body: If you have dispel magic prepared or can cast it spontaneously, when you score a critical hit against an opponent, you may use a swift action to cast dispel magic to make a targeted dispel against that opponent.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your blows attack the physical and arcane forms of your enemies at the same time.
